lexUnit.name: criticism.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: the expression of disapproval of someone or something based on perceived faults or mistakes.
